name: Tomb Robbers 3: Curse of the Pharaoh
name_original: Tomb Robbers 3: Curse of the Pharaoh
description:
What a pickle you got yourself into again! Just as you were removing King Tatukanumen's jewels from his grave, the walls start to close in on you -- can you escape without being flattened like a pancake?

Entry for Ludum Dare 42
